messages.title: Strong Leadership, Clear Economic Plan, A better more secure future.
HELP FLICK DRUMMOND WIN HERE
messages.content: With a strong track record of campaigning for Portsmouth South, Flick Drummond is the best choice to be your strong, local voice in Parliament. Whether it’s fighting for a fairer funding deal for our schools and colleges or campaigning for better broadband and mobile coverage, Flick has a proven record of standing up for residents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A clear long-term economic plan to secure a better future for Portsmouth.
Improving access to GP surgeries and supporting Portsmouth hospital.
Giving every child the chance to attend a good local school.
Building a stronger, healthier economy and securing jobs and investment in Portsmouth.
Protecting green spaces, air quality, and encouraging recycling.

issues.economy: We will deliver a clear long-term economic plan that is securing a better future for Portsmouth, bringing more jobs and businesses to our area.
issues.education: We are driving up standards in our schools so every child can have a good place.
issues.environment: We are protecting our precious environment – our green spaces, clean air and encouraging recycling.
issues.health: We are improving our NHS so people can get the care and treatment when they need it.

housing.content: More affordable homes being built across our city.

leaflet.personalStatement: I love living in Portsmouth. It’s a city united by its great sense of community. Each day I meet those who share my determination to unlock the City’s full potential.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought for a fairer funding deal for our schools and colleges, better broadband, mobile coverage, protecting our green spaces, clean air and encouraging recycling.

endorsements.endorsement: Flick Drummond is a brilliant campaigner with a track record of standing up for Portsmouth South.

quotes.text: Flick has a proven record of standing up for residents.
